title: HOPE Assessment Entry UI
description:
Create HOPE Assessment Data Entry Form with Structured Sections and Validation

Build a comprehensive form interface for entering HOPE (Health Outcomes and Patient Experience) assessment data, organized into logical sections with robust validation and error handling.

Requirements:
- Design multi-section form layout with clear visual separation between sections
- Implement section-based organization (e.g., Patient Information, Clinical Metrics, Outcome Measures, etc.)
- Add appropriate input fields for each data point with correct input types (text, number, date, radio, checkbox, dropdown)
- Implement field-level validation rules:
  * Required field validation
  * Format validation (dates, numeric ranges, pattern matching)
  * Cross-field validation where dependencies exist
  * Real-time validation feedback with clear error messages
- Add section completion indicators or progress tracking
- Enable save/draft functionality to prevent data loss
- Implement form submission with server-side validation
- Provide clear success/error feedback after submission
- Ensure keyboard navigation and accessibility standards (ARIA labels, focus management)
- Make form responsive across device sizes

Consider:
- Whether form should support multi-page/wizard format vs single scrollable page
- Data persistence strategy (auto-save, manual save, session storage)
- Required vs optional fields based on assessment requirements
- Integration with existing patient/assessment data systems
- User permissions and data security requirements
